thread.title_full: Stay here if you have a train to Cath early in the morning - Review of Ibis Paris Gare de l'Est TGV, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ana_Carol_Barreto
title: Stay here if you have a train to Cath early in the morning
text: We chose to stay in this hotel because we spent one night in Paris on our way to the Champagne region. The hotel is conveniently located next to Gare De L'est station, which is useful if you have to get an early train the next morning. Also, there are a number of restaurants at walking distance from the hotel.
